tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE approved_repair_shops (
    shop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    shop_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    shop_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    shop_contact VARCHAR(20),
    approved_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE claims (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    shop_id INT,
    claim_date DATE,
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (shop_id) REFERENCES repair_shops(shop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE repair_claims (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    shop_id INT NOT NULL,
    claim_date DATE NOT NULL,
    claim_description TEXT,
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (shop_id) REFERENCES approved_repair_shops(shop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE repair_shop_ratings (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    shop_id INT NOT NULL,
    rating INT NOT NULL,
    review TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (shop_id) REFERENCES approved_repair_shops(shop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE claims (
  claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  shop_id INT,
  claim_date DATE,
  claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_shop_id FOREIGN KEY (shop_id) REFERENCES repair_shops(shop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  employee_role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  shop_id INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_shop_id FOREIGN KEY (shop_id) REFERENCES repair_shops(shop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE repair_shop (
    shop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    shop_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    shop_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    shop_city VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    shop_state VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE claim (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    repair_date DATE NOT NULL,
    shop_id INT NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_shop FOREIGN KEY (shop_id) REFERENCES repair_shop(shop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE claim_approval (
    approval_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    claim_id INT NOT NULL,
    status_id INT NOT NULL,
    approval_date DATE NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT fk_claim FOREIGN KEY (claim_id) REFERENCES claim(claim_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_status FOREIGN KEY (status_id) REFERENCES claim_status(status_id)
);
